name: Doctor Appointment Management System check-appointment.php文件SQL注入漏洞
product: ["Doctor Appointment Management System Doctor Appointment Management System 1.0"]
description: Doctor Appointment Management System是一个医生预约管理系统。Doctor Appointment Management System存在SQL注入漏洞，该漏洞源于/check-appointment.php的参数searchdata缺少对外部输入SQL语句的验证。攻击者可利用该漏洞执行非法SQL命令窃取数据库敏感数据。
solution:
目前厂商尚未发布升级程序修复该安全问题，详情见厂商官网：
https://phpgurukul.com/
